Reviews.Title: “Hope to go back!”
Reviews.Author: Nicole2004
Reviews.Content: welcoming mid priced hotel breakfast fantastic buffet hotel justice cereals fresh fruit salad peaches boiled eggs salami ham cakes bread plentifull beautifully clean maid thoroughly cleaning changing towels morning etc tidied twice day didnt doing shower efficient cubicle modern standards lots marble throughout

Reviews.Title: “very disappoining”
Reviews.Author: spring298555
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel price reasonable definitely worth arrived noticed clean linens mascara pillowcases hair coffeepot bedroom ice bucket filled glasses tray lip marks impressed moreover concierge disrespectful towards foreigners

Reviews.Author: Mendonut
Reviews.Content: stayed 3nights celebration 105 modern appointed roomy sparkling clean interior balcony hotel lobby bar appointed furnish service reception bar expected 4star hotel cordial professional hotel rooftop bar closed winter looked view spectacular hotel halfblock piazza del popolo sum 4star hotel bit pricey rome hotels pricey definitely stay hotel trip rome

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”

Reviews.Content: loved hotel family teenage kids adjoining bit location friendliness staff breakfast fine hotel recommended restaurant 59 daughters birthday wonderful walking distance hotel

Reviews.Content: hotel center ancient rome furnished liked breakfast terrace spectacular view concierge guys funny gritty hotel recommend sorry appreciated advice concierge restaurant recommended restaurant worst meal entire trip

Reviews.Content: hotel friendly heart rome strategic hotel nice finished interior approve hotel restaurant valid reference advice send worst restaurants rome happened restaurant sana bad restaurant outraged advice

Reviews.Title: “solid but did not exceed expectations”
Reviews.Author: abrhmsnm
Reviews.Content: reserved junior suite hard tell web site looked reality regular hotel size reminded york hotels bathroom shower tub little tight 6 feet plus bed comfortable floor corner quiet service solid luca restaurants breakfast fine include eggs hotels stayed florence positano access internet tv wifi convenient

Reviews.Title: “Great location, super clean, helpful staff...what else could you ask for?”
Reviews.Author: Luvtotravel1229
Reviews.Content: trip rome tuscany spent nights rome guided tour sites hotel boutique hotel piaza del popolo nice rome time walked time left didnt single negative experience spotless rooftop lounge beautiful six party agreed total experience breakfast morning yes rates pricey paid lifetime chance travel

Reviews.Title: “Best Kept Secret in Rome”
Reviews.Author: travello2010
Reviews.Content: spent 7 days hotel beginning probably kept secrets rome staff extremely friendly thank luca davide alessandro help location difficult beat cant wait return grazie mille montreal canada

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing, expensive and noisy”
Reviews.Author: bnc2oths
Reviews.Content: 288 euros choice 4th floor noisy street facing suite 2 persons bottom floor suite larger adequate mistake selecting bottom floor suite nice patio facing courtyard neighboring apartments share courtyard security alarms 4 times day earth shattering piercing desk powerless stop alarms lasted 2 days wouldnt move mistaken admitted happened apt owners wifi ethernet strongly advise hotel nice people helpful bad experience poor fitness center hot windows

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, excellent location, price too expensive”
Reviews.Author: YossiAzoulay
Reviews.Content: arrived weekend rome recommendation friend hotel located busiest shopping city streets steps piazza di popolo romes famous tourist attractions walking distance hotel breakfast average typical priced hotel addition scrambled eggs freshly squeezed juice naturally charged amount 5 euro sauna charge fee 15 euro justified price hotel

Reviews.Title: “Loved this Hotel..Cannot wait to go back!”
Reviews.Author: aphillytraveler
Reviews.Content: traveled italy 9 days teenage sons hotel favorite location couldnt able walk hotel boutique type feel friendly 4th floor suite 501 suite absolutely loved 501 nicest stayed roomy living comfortable bedroom nice size bathroom beatiful built ins throughout suite kitchen magnificent private werent able porch due time visited breaksfast delicious variety cheeses meats fruit pastries cereals juices brew fresh coffee person 401 teenage boys perfectly comfortable stay recommend friends

Reviews.Title: “Can't beat the location”
Reviews.Author: Susan53437
Reviews.Content: stayed nights husband departing cruise location outstanding via babuino spanish steps piazza del populo staff helpful hotel clean quiet loved enjoying drink day rooftop terrace buffet breakfast fresh sufficient particular nicely appointed albeit space bit tight balcony enjoyed illusion space doors marble bathroom roomy recommend 5 minutes hotel head towards spanish steps believe third alley left food decent price house red enjoy

Reviews.Title: “Great location - worth a stay!”
Reviews.Author: mic1984
Reviews.Content: stayed nice period rome autumn tourists hot hotels location piazza del popolo 5 mins walk spanish steps underground standard layout service friendly helpful experience fb rome weekend hotel highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great value”
Reviews.Author: farawayNJ
Reviews.Content: beautiful wellappointed hotel location piazza del popolo close spanish steps price excellent quality location european hotel queensize bed barely fit climbing suitcases move husband 67 tiny stall shower major challenge normal size people hotel value especially prices hotels breakfast included terrific plenty options homemade baked fresh fruit yogurt fantastic meatscheeses staff extremely helpful friendly wouldnt hesitate recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “WE LOVE THIS HOTEL. PERFECT LOCATION IN ROME!”

Reviews.Content: stayed lovely hotel rome 2010 location perfect walk hotel elegant clean wonderful value rome highly recomend hotel sitting computer hook ups lovely roof top bar amazing views city cant wait rome explore shop
